resources.string: Update developer setting state failed. Please check your root permission.
Set property success, press kill debug application and restart it to see the result.

- This application must be installed under [/system/app] in order to get writing system settings permission.

- That is why we need root permission.

- Now we detect that this application haven't be installed under [/system/app].

- It may because of first time installation or application update reason.

- After click the button below, this application will be move/installed into [system/app], and automatically reboot this device.
It seems that the installation is finished. Now you can reboot your device and see whether it works.
If you click uninstall below, the app will be remove from [system/app] directory. You have to reinstall this application to reopen it.
It seems that the uninstallation is finished. Now you can reboot your device and see whether it works.
Get Adb through wifi state failed.
